plot:
The alcoholic teacher Anna wakes up one morning in her house and finds a
 dead 16-year old boy in her bedroom. She's clueless to what's been 
happening, but is soon convincing herself that she caused his death. Her
 brother thinks otherwise.
title: Den som viskar
